name: 踏空人生
description: 踏空人生 is a community-driven memecoin born from a viral X post that captured the feeling of “missing out” — a universal regret in every trader’s journey. Built on Binance Smart Chain, the project turns that emotion into empowerment, reminding everyone to be bold and embrace the moment. With humor, culture, and collective energy, 踏空人生 transforms FOMO into fun and courage. It’s more than a token — it’s a movement celebrating the brave degens who dare to leap instead of watching from the sidelines.
